issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: The refactor unintentionally implemented the ArrowPrimitiveType trait for strings. This was not intended. This mistake leaked into one example and the record batch struct.
fields.summary: [Rust] Refactor introduced a bug around Arrays of String
